@MolochDAO’s secret sauce lies in the simplicity of the design ... arguably most successful DAO deployment to date based on:

-intuitive governance

1125992445135790080.text:
.@MolochDAO was a grassroots community effort, there's a lot of people who put their nights and weekends into getting it off the ground. 

Mostly we did it for fun though, DAOs are more fun with friends!

1125981804136022016.text:
. @ameensol started what will become one of the most used DAO frameworks on Ethereum *as a side project*

No ICO.  No fancy branding. Pure simple design + follow through + clever memetic marketing. And it’s got more adoption than projects that ICOed to create DAOs! 

Respect

1125968775394631680.text: It had 95% of the functionalities we needed and had the appropriate abilities to iterate off the initial framework. It was what we simply needed. Anything else is a distraction imo. We call it a DAO, it more like trusted a collective that ‘uses’ a DAO to coordinate funds.

1116407457964855296.text: Every org I've ever seen can improve, but I think the Ethereum Foundation does a tremendous job of helping Ethereum. There's room for others to help shepherd this public good (like @MolochDAO), but at this point, there's no one else I'd rather see play a preeminent role.

1115695401720401920.text:
Moloch scales to $100M by scaling to $10M, which it does by scaling to $1M, which it does by proving that the model works today with $400K, and at each subsequent stepwise increase in funds. 

We don't have to figure everything out in advance.https://mobile.twitter.com/ameensol/status/1107309429068689410 …

1115404020569350144.text: So at this point I think the best course of action is to coordinate around voluntary donation systems like @MolochDAO. Maybe with enough proof that DAOs work allocating block rewards to a DAO would be less contentious and I'll change my mind, but it'll take a few years at least.

DAOs don't just magically makes these public goods, tragedy of the commons problem go away." #unchainedlive

1108525218837004288.text: On @MolochDAO, @VitalikButerin says, "It's definitely an interesting experiment. First of all, I'm really glad to see that people in the community has taken initiative to pusher ethereum and its ecosystem forward in a way that makes sense. I think that’s valuable."

1108510164368478215.text:
Q. Take on @MolochDAO?
A. “If Foundation has constraints other projects can fill in these gaps. Challenge I see if these DAOs are a way of organizing charity spending. DAOs by itself doesn’t fix the tragedy of the commons problem.”

S/O to @bradleyc & co on the DAO vs DAO hack at @ETHCapeTown https://devpost.com/software/delian 

A state channel for DAOs to govern moves & play with other DAOs, each with its own strategy & voting mechanisms.

DAO-to-DAO interactions are the future of intelligence coordination.pic.twitter.com/r1sCJQhpqw

1115952125568118784.text:
So to summarize…

1. Everyone is self-interested & its okay
2. Fifty Shades of Grey: Ethereum is coming to a theater near you
3. Let's define goals of inflation funding before committing
4. Join @MolochDAO to test mechanisms we all peacock about & get Ethereum projects funded

1115468547302416385.text:
DAOs are still unproven and we're continuing to learn about the effectiveness of @MolochDAO mechanisms to avoid capture and coordinate groups sustainably.

We're excited about its potential to contribute to Ethereum governance. Thread on possible future uses for @MolochDAO https://twitter.com/TrustlessState/status/1115457528953954305 …

1115451404242436098.text: The ragequit function ensures that members have ongoing sovereignty over their contributions. This is a vital DAO mechanism to avoid capture. https://twitter.com/ameensol/status/1115417271621414915 …

1106298107577405441.text: .@MolochDAO is committed to Ethereum sustainability with more proposals to come & supports other exploratory efforts like inflation funding proposed by @owocki https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/1789 … & @VitalikButerin’s suggestion of 1gwei contributions by clients/wallethttps://twitter.com/VitalikButerin/status/1103997378967810048 …

1106296573678501888.text:
To participate in the @MolochDAO experiment:

1. Reach out to an existing member to submit your membership proposal
2. Wait the voting period
3. If vote is in favor, huzzah! Commit tribute to Moloch 
4. Submit funding proposals for Ethereum projects
5. Vote in new members!
